Name: Clandestino
Ingredients: 60 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass. Special ingredient #1 : Homemade honey-vinegar
History: Greek Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail by Xaris Darras, Mr. Peacock, Chalandri Athens.
Nutrition: One serving of Clandestino contains 175 calories
